attributes.action: Count, declare and read the spoiled ballot papers at every election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people feel that their vote is pointless (with good reason), and some even have good suggestions on how to improve the system; if the number of "spoiled papers" was declared, maybe the government would realise that (whilst there are worse in the world) our voting system needs to be reformed.
